Results Handling & Testing

extension.valueString: Describe your process for reviewing and documenting scan results...

items.question: How are scan results reviewed and documented? Describe your process for reviewing and documenting scan results...
items.value: Scan results from antivirus, anti-malware, and file integrity monitoring tools are automatically collected and centralized in our security management console. IT security personnel review alerts daily, prioritize issues based on severity, and document findings in a dedicated tracking system. For each detected threat, the documentation includes the source, affected system, mitigation actions taken, and verification of resolution. Periodic reports are generated for management review, compliance audits, and continuous improvement of our security posture

items.question: What is your response timeframe when malware or vulnerabilities are detected?

extension.valueString: Describe your process for remediating issues detected during scanning..

items.question: Describe your remediation process for identified issues: Describe your process for remediating issues detected during scanning...
items.value: When a threat or issue is detected during scanning, it is immediately prioritized based on severity and potential impact. Automated actions, such as quarantining or blocking the malicious file, are applied where possible. For issues requiring manual intervention, IT security personnel follow documented procedures to investigate, remediate, and verify resolution. Each incident is logged in the tracking system with details of the affected system, actions taken, and verification results. Remediation steps are reviewed periodically to ensure efficiency, compliance, and continuous improvement of the security process

items.codingInstructions: Establish procedures to review scan results, respond to detected threats, and test scanning tools for effectiveness.
items.codingInstructionsPlain: Establish procedures to review scan results, respond to detected threats, and test scanning tools for effectiveness.
